appDefinition.Label: TSC Agent Console

<isNavPersonalizationDisabled>false</isNavPersonalizationDisabled> <isServiceCloudConsole>true</isServiceCloudConsole> <label>TSC Agent Console</label> <logo>SharedDocuments/New_Red_Cross_logo.gif</logo> <preferences> <enableCustomizeMyTabs>false</enableCustomizeMyTabs> <enableKeyboardShortcuts>true</enableKeyboardShortcuts>
